name: Super Cactus Corp
description:
A "mega micro platformer" developed during late 2019. 

Features:

  • Ten challenging levels that test your platforming skills and your quick thinking
  • Get to know your co-workers, who are cacti.
  • An interactive ending which lets you decide the theme of the story.

Standard controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

S - Duck

W - Talk to/Enter door

Spacebar - Jump

Credits: 

Game by Lukas Kleberg.

Art assets by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Music by Juhani Junkala (www.juhanijunkala.com)
